channel.title: Please someone help i got problem with client
channel.description: I have Windows 7. And i have JDK (64 bit), Java (64 bit). No-ip, - etc etc And i have changed the ip on the client to mine. When i run the server and get on my client. The client wont loading. It just say: Connecting to Update server. But it never loading. I have tryed diff server & clients but it dont still works. Can anyone help me with this?

item.title: Please someone help i got problem with client
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

Huh, i donâ€™t get what you mean change the no-ip. to 0.0.0.0 and when you have port foward the server you can change it to what ever your new ip is http://www.runelocus.com/?action=rspstut

Is a great guide there how to portfoward your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Please someone help i got problem with client
